entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 09:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 50 near Haro Strait this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h except 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
